languages.text: {n}Арджента складывает {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилу{/g}.{/n} "Да охрани души несчастных, да забери их под крыло Свое, да обретут покой верные слуги Твои..."
{n}Argenta makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "Protect the souls of the stricken and take them under Your wing, that Your faithful servants may find peace..."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента складывает {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилу{/g}.{/n} "Да охрани души несчастных, да забери их под крыло Свое, да обретут покой верные слуги Твои..."

languages.text: {n}Argenta hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} «Protege las almas de los caídos y acógelos bajo Tu mano, para que Tus fieles sirvientes encuentren la paz...».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "Protect the souls of the stricken and take them under Your wing, that Your faithful servants may find peace..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta hace el signo del Aquila.{/n} «Protege las almas de los caídos y acógelos bajo Tu mano, para que Tus fieles sirvientes encuentren la paz...».

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラの印{/g}を作る。{/n}「傷ついた魂を守り、あなたの羽根の下に匿ってください。忠実な従者たちが、平穏を見つけられるように…」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "Protect the souls of the stricken and take them under Your wing, that Your faithful servants may find peace..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタはアクィラの印を作る。{/n}「傷ついた魂を守り、あなたの羽根の下に匿ってください。忠実な従者たちが、平穏を見つけられるように…」

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔做了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰手势{/g}。{/n}“愿您守护那些不幸之人的灵魂，将他们庇佑在您的羽翼之下，让您忠心耿耿的仆人得以安息……”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "Protect the souls of the stricken and take them under Your wing, that Your faithful servants may find peace..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔做了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“愿您守护那些不幸之人的灵魂，将他们庇佑在您的羽翼之下，让您忠心耿耿的仆人得以安息……”

languages.text: {n}Argenta macht das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g}.{/n} "Beschützt die Seelen der Gepeinigten und nehmt sie unter Eure Fittiche, auf dass Eure treuen Diener Frieden finden können ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "Protect the souls of the stricken and take them under Your wing, that Your faithful servants may find peace..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta macht das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n} "Beschützt die Seelen der Gepeinigten und nehmt sie unter Eure Fittiche, auf dass Eure treuen Diener Frieden finden können ..."

languages.text: {n}Argenta fait le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} « Protégez les âmes des malheureux et prenez-les sous Votre aile, que Vos fidèles serviteurs trouvent enfin la paix... »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "Protect the souls of the stricken and take them under Your wing, that Your faithful servants may find peace..."

languages.text: {n}Argenta, {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapıyor.{/n} "Izdıraba tutulanların ruhlarını koru ve onları kanatlarının altına al ki sadık hizmetkârların huzura erişebilsin..."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g}.{/n} "Protect the souls of the stricken and take them under Your wing, that Your faithful servants may find peace..."
